SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'install_order_header'
select main.dateStr, count(1) count from ( select date_format(created, "%M-%Y") dateStr, created from install_order_header ) main group by dateStr order by Month(created)

select subArea, date_format(created, "%M-%Y") dateStr, count(1) count from install_order_header where subArea is not null and subArea != '' group by subArea, date_format(created, "%M-%Y") order by subArea, Month(created)
select date_format(created, "%M-%Y") dateStr, count(1) count from receipt_header group by date_format(created, "%M-%Y") order by Month(created)

select internalInstructionType, date_format(created, "%M-%Y") dateStr, count(1) count from receipt_header group by internalInstructionType, date_format(created, "%M-%Y") order by internalInstructionType, Month(created)
select processType, count(1) count from transaction_history group by processType

select (select count(1) count from ttx_user) total_count, monthname(current_date()) curr_month, count(1) curr_count from ttx_user where month(created) = month(current_date()) and year(created) = year(current_date()) order by created

select (select count(1) count from install_order_header) total_count, monthname(current_date()) curr_month, count(1) curr_count from install_order_header where month(created) = month(current_date()) and year(created) = year(current_date()) order by created

select (select count(1) count from transaction_history) total_count, monthname(current_date()) curr_month, count(1) curr_count from transaction_history where month(created) = month(current_date()) and year(created) = year(current_date()) order by created

select (select count(1) count from shipment_confirm_header) total_count, monthname(current_date()) curr_month, count(1) curr_count from shipment_confirm_header where month(created) = month(current_date()) and year(created) = year(current_date()) order by created

select created, code, shipToAttentionTo, area, neType, seriviceType, soType, groupType, serviceId, shipToAddress, sourceOrderCode from install_order_header where date(created) = current_date() order by created

select main.state , group_concat(main.summary) total_count from ( select state, concat(' ', level,':' ,count(1)) summary from area group by state, level ) main where state is not null group by main.state
